answers.answer: I don't know of any general restriction, I know I can/could exercise when on beta blocker and warfarin, but I have no experience with scuba diving.That said, I read your post to say your doctor put a restriction on you and that means more than any input you might get here - or you could go to another doctor and get a second opinion.Good luck,

question: I am a 55 year old male who was diagnosed with A-fib and had corrective operation July of 2011. The doctor put me on Pradaxa and Cardizem CD. I am also a type 2 diabetic on Levimer and Victosa. My diabetes doctor said it was ok to go diving but my heart doctor was not sure because of the medications. Can I still scuba dive while I am on those medications and or is there any restrictions I should be made aware of.Thank you
title: Scuba Diving while taking Pradaxa and Cardizem CD
